name: Chick Chick Eggs
description:
THE STORY:

- The Story of the game is simple with amazing 3d effects for gear glasses and 164 challenge levels
- The game include 5 play modes, Scores, Choclate eggs, Glass, white Egg droper and Colorful eggs collector.
- Match 3, 4 or 5 horizontal or vertical Eggs to destroy them and collect scores
- Match 4 Eggs as a Square and get flying baby chick to help in the crush
- Collect more Golden Eggs to replace them with super boosters
- Boosters like sniper, magic chick and shake plus the rainbow Egg boosters they help the player to overcome the difficulties of the hard levels.
- Drag and drop 2 boosters over each other to boost the crush while the paying
- Drag and drop the flying chick over each other to generate many flying chicks to help you
